name: sdc_public_key
post_cmd: touch /root/.ssh/authorized_keys; sed -i '.bak' -e '/ sdc key$/d' /root/.ssh/authorized_keys; echo '' >>/root/.ssh/authorized_keys; cat /root/.ssh/sdc.id_rsa.pub >>/root/.ssh/authorized_keys
post_cmd_linux: touch /root/.ssh/authorized_keys; sed -i '.bak' -e '/ sdc key$/d' /root/.ssh/authorized_keys; echo '' >>/root/.ssh/authorized_keys; cat /root/.ssh/sdc.id_rsa.pub >>/root/.ssh/authorized_keys
